basics.name: Denniel Joshua T. Diaz
basics.label: Associate Software Engineer
basics.summary: Denniel Joshua hails from Mabalacat, Pampanga. He has earned degrees from the Mabalacat City College. While a student, he worked for TORO Limited as a part time software developer. While his work focuses on JavaScript development. At TORO Limited he used frameworks and languages such as NodeJS, Express, AngularJS and React, his non-work interests range widely, everything from anime to creating music beats. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!

highlights: Built a fast authentication system for torocloud using NodeJS, Express and Redis
Built a custom version of swagger-ui that fits toro's themes and authentication system using ReactJS
Built an application that automatically uploads pictures to Instagram from a CSV file for the company owner's other business using TORO Integrate (TORO's own Enterprise Service Bus)

Currently maintaining and refactoring a chrome extension that crawls API's documentation and builds an OpenAPI Specification from the crawled data. The extension is written using ES6, HandlebarsJS and SCSS

awards.title: Hackathon Champion
awards.summary: Created a Notes CRUD Application Frontend: AngularJS Backend: Laravel

awards.title: Most Proficient Programmer of the Year
